ScriptName: select * from    (    select top 1 queue_time_sec / (3600.0) as queue_time95_h    from    (    select top 5 percent DATEDIFF(SS, cl_resume_date, getdate()) as queue_time_sec    from CRQIncident with(nolock)    where assignee_group=109093 and status  in( 2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007)    and assignee = assignee_group    order by 1 desc    ) t    order by queue_time_sec    ) w1,    (    select top 1 proc_time_sec / (3600.0) as proc_time95_h    from    (    select top 5 percent DATEDIFF(SS, cl_resume_date, getdate()) as proc_time_sec    from CRQIncident with(nolock)    where assignee_group=109093 and status  in( 2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007)    order by 1 desc    ) t    order by proc_time_sec    ) w2,    (    select count(*) as opencrq, sum(case when assignee = assignee_group then 1 else 0 end) as in_queue    from CRQIncident with(nolock)    where assignee_group=109093 and status  in( 2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007)    ) w3
